mapper.update:
MERGE INTO EDUCATION edu USING (
SELECT #{item.eduSeq, jdbcType=VARCHAR} as eduSeq ,#{item.recSeq, jdbcType=VARCHAR} as recSeq ,#{item.eduSchool, jdbcType=VARCHAR} as eduSchool ,#{item.eduDiv, jdbcType=VARCHAR} as eduDiv ,#{item.eduLoc, jdbcType=VARCHAR} as eduLoc ,#{item.eduStart, jdbcType=VARCHAR} as eduStart ,#{item.eduEnd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} as eduEnd ,#{item.eduMajor, jdbcType=VARCHAR} as eduMajor ,#{item.eduGrade, jdbcType=VARCHAR} as eduGrade FROM DUAL
) du ON (edu.EDU_SEQ = du.eduSeq AND edu.SEQ = du.recSeq)
WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET edu.SCHOOL_NAME = du.eduSchool ,edu.DIVISION = du.eduDiv ,edu.START_PERIOD = du.eduStart ,edu.END_PERIOD = du.eduEnd ,edu.MAJOR = du.eduMajor ,edu.GRADE = du.eduGrade ,edu.LOCATION = du.eduLoc
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( EDU_SEQ ,SEQ ,SCHOOL_NAME ,DIVISION ,START_PERIOD ,END_PERIOD ,MAJOR ,GRADE ,LOCATION ) VALUES( du.eduSeq ,du.recSeq ,du.eduSchool ,du.eduDiv ,du.eduStart ,du.eduEnd ,du.eduMajor ,du.eduGrade ,du.eduLoc )
